title: Andersonville National Historic Site: Professional Development
body: Professional Development        Historical & Environmental Education Reading All too often the story of Andersonville is filtered by opinion and emotion in secondary source materials. A wealth of primary source material regarding prisoners of war and Andersonville exists which can be used to gain a better understanding of the Civil War prisoner of war experience at Andersonville and beyond. All Historical & Environmental Education Reading   Featured Item    The Trial of Henry Wirz Learn More
